TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConfigurationElementCollectionType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of a ConfigurationElementCollectionType object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration contains all the possible return values for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A> property. It is used by the configuration system during run time to correctly merge configuration settings. It is also used when creating a custom class that extends <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.
By default, the type of a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> object is F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.AddRemoveClearMap?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True. If a F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.BasicMap?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is required, override the ConfigurationElementCollectionType property when extending T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType AddRemoveClearMap = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The default type of T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True. Collections of this type contain elements that can be merged across a hierarchy of configuration files. At any particular level within such a hierarchy, `add`, `remove`, and `clear` directives are used to modify any inherited properties and specify new ones.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType AddRemoveClearMapAlternate = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Same as F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.AddRemoveClearMap?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, except that this type causes the T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True object to sort its contents such that inherited elements are listed last.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType BasicMap = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Collections of this type contain elements that apply to the level at which they are specified, and to all child levels. A child level cannot modify the properties specified by a parent element of this type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType BasicMapAlternate = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Same as F:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType.BasicMap?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True, except that this type causes the T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True object to sort its contents such that inherited elements are listed last.
